Common.Highlight.Common.Text: AMENITIES: Programming, Catering, Conferencing, Fitness Center, Dining, Salon, Car Wash + Detailing, Shoe Shine

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Merritt 7 is conveniently connected to the entire NYC Metro area, as well as all major thoroughfares in Fairfield County. New Haven and Manhattan are less than an hour away via the South Norwalk Metro North Station, while the on-site Merritt 7 train station offers additional service. The Norwalk Bus service is also easily accessible, offering dedicated transit service to all M7 buildings. With hundreds of new housing units under construction, along with arrival of The SoNo Collection, a contemporary state-of-the-art shopping destination, as well as other recreation and cultural attractions, M7’s rising status as a live-work-play destination continues to progress.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: As the largest and most prominent corporate park in Fairfield County, Merritt 7 boasts the amenities, accessibility and vibrancy of an urban setting fused with the serenity and growth of Norwalk. In addition to providing easy access to anywhere in the NY Metropolitan area, Merritt 7 boasts an unparalleled diversity of tenants and a variety of space options suitable for occupancy of any size or type.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: AMENITIES: Programming, Catering, Conferencing, Fitness Center, Dining, Salon, Car Wash + Detailing, Shoe Shine

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Merritt 7 is conveniently connected to the entire NYC Metro area, as well as all major thoroughfares in Fairfield County. New Haven and Manhattan are less than an hour away via the South Norwalk Metro North Station, while the on-site Merritt 7 train station offers additional service. The Norwalk Bus service is also easily accessible, offering dedicated transit service to all M7 buildings. With hundreds of new housing units under construction, along with arrival of The SoNo Collection, a contemporary state-of-the-art shopping destination, as well as other recreation and cultural attractions, M7’s rising status as a live-work-play destination continues to progress.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
As the largest and most prominent corporate park in Fairfield County, Merritt 7 boasts the amenities, accessibility and vibrancy of an urban setting fused with the serenity and growth of Norwalk. In addition to providing easy access to anywhere in the NY Metropolitan area, Merritt 7 boasts an unparalleled diversity of tenants and a variety of space options suitable for occupancy of any size or type.

Spread across a campus of six unique buildings, Merritt 7 contains over 1.4M sq. ft of LEED Certified, Class A office space. While each building has its own unique boutique ambiance and features, all are environmentally-responsible and fully equipped with in-building conveniences, flexible floorplates, and access to Merritt 7’s park-wide amenities program, interconnected outdoor plazas, and the Merritt 7 commuter shuttle.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
AMENITIES
Full service cafeteria 
Beautiful atrium lobby with access to wireless internet network (WiFi) 
State-of-the-art fitness center 
Conference facility 
Newsstand/sundry shop (with dry cleaning service) 
3.5 parking spaces per 1,000 rsf (50% covered) 
Shuttle service to the Darien and South Norwalk train stations 
Adjacent to Exit 13 of I-95

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Conference Center - COLLABORATE in our brand new, tech-optimized conference space with indoor/outdoor connectivity.
Activated Outdoor Patio - TAKE A BREAK in our new space for midday recreation or a mental breather.
Cafe - REPLENISH in a completely renovated, full-service tenant eatery.
Reimaged Atrium Lobby - A dynamic first impression on clients and guests
Fitness Center - 5,000-sq.-ft., athletic-quality fitness center.
Shuttle - tTo/From the Darien and South Norwalk (SoNo) train stations.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Inspiration happens when you have the flexibility to work how you want.
800 Connecticut has efficient side cores with minimal columns – so your space is unobstructed. Put up walls, or let them down… whichever would spark some new passion for what you do.
